name: Timmy's Nightmare
description:
Description:

Timmy wakes up in a mysterious room. There seems to be weird noises all around. Can Timmy escape unscathed? Will Timmy survive? Run, Hide, and Escape in this horror game I developed "Timmy's Nightmare"!

Diversifiers:

Phasmophobia: Timmy has a flashlight to help see things

Sus: Keys cannot be seen without a flashlight

Kepakan Sayap Baliho: It's dark

Controls:

Right - Left Keys: Move Right/Left

Down Keys: Interact with doors,  keys. Hold down to hide in cabinet

Space Bar: Turn on and off the flash light

Assets:

Level layouts and key sprite: Designed by me

Player Sprite: Character: Steven [FREE] by Kronovi- (itch.io)

Enemy Sprite:  Shadow Mines - Free 2D Game Asset Pack by waxx, ANtY (itch.io)

Sounds:

  • Freesound - "coin7.wav" by The-Sacha-Rush
  • Freesound - "Door Locked" by BenjaminNelan
  • Freesound - "OpenDoor.wav" by beansqueso31
  • Freesound - "Alarm clock ticking.wav" by straget
  • Freesound - "Ghost Whispers 1" by nolam20
  • Freesound - "Cthulhu growl.wav" by cylon8472
  • Freesound - "Demonic Woman Scream.wav" by nick121087
